statement.tex: \text{After how many terms will the first negative term}\newline \text{appear in the following arithmetic progression}\newline \qquad 121, 117, 113,\ldots

step.reason: \text{The n-th term of an arithmetic progression is }\newline \quad a_n = a_0 + (n-1)\cdot d,\text{ where }a_0 = \text{first term}
\text{As }n\text{ increases, }a_n\text{ decreases.}\newline \text{And at some }n, a_n\lt 0.\text{ We need to find that }n.
